div.p: We are rebuilding TEI Lex-0 from the ground up to deliver a clearer, more stable reference that is easier to use and maintain.
In parallel, we are setting up a robust deployment pipeline so releases are reproducible, versioned, and long-lived. See the deployment documentation.
This site is not yet ready for production use and some features may not work. For the time being, please stick with that clunky, old behemoth of a site while we complete the transition.
